item.title: Strategy
item.description:
[!info]+ Important

MyEasyAgent is more than a business; it’s a mission to bridge the gap between the “average Nigerian” and their right to a home. In a market like Lagos, where “Who you know” often outweighs “What you pay,” our platform prioritizes performance over deep pockets. This blueprint defines the “What,” “Why,” and “How” of our journey.

1. Execution Summary

MyEasyAgent is a trust-centric PropTech ecosystem designed specifically for the Nigerian market. Unlike traditional listing sites that prioritize paid visibility, we utilize a Performance-Based Ranking system and a Usage-Based Monetization model.

item.title: What Can We Remove?
item.description:
In 2021, the noise got too loud. My screen was filled with other people’s highlights, and i felt behind.
I was tired, anxious, and scrolling through a life that wasn’t mine.

So I started to quietly unfollow. I kept only what built me up. The noise faded. My mind cleared. I could breathe again.

We often treat our lives and our businesses like our social feeds.

We add and add. More features. More steps. More rules. Interdependencies proliferate, and gradually strangle us. We think more means better. But really, more often means more clutter.
